The expert: s investigation found no evidence to support this claim. They searched ABC 7's website, Nexis news archives, Google, and the broadcast media monitoring website TVEyes, but found no reports about the shooting on October 23 or any earlier date.
ABC 7: s first published news reports about the school shooting were on November 14, the day of the incident.
The Facebook post highlighted a story sn: but it was actually published on November 14, not three weeks before the shooting happened. The claim of reporting the shooting in advance appears to be a false flag theory fueled through social media.
